A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It never ceases to amaze me how critics will praise terrible movies if they exist within franchises they are fond of. The biggest problem here is that Last Jedi is just plain boring. It isn't just a bad Star Wars movie\, it's an incomprehensible piece of junk. We jump from one boring story thread to another and are expected to believe its all unfolding in a fraction of the time that it would reasonably take to do this stuff. Do yourself a favour and go to Wikkipedia to read the plot details. At least you'll save yourself 2 hours
